column2: create table SqlStatement (--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- --/H a row for each distinct SQL statement in the SQL Log. ------------------------------------------------------------------------------- --/T See also the SqlLogAll view that denomalizes the table. ------------------------------------------------------------------------------- statementID int identity (#, #) not # primary key, --/D unique identifier statement varchar (#) not #, --/D the SQL statement hits int not #, --/D how many times it occurred in the log. TemplateID int not # --/D id of generic version of this statement.) go
